name: HP-ALM
gist: Formerly known as HP Quality Center is a quality management software offered by Micro Focus, who acquired the software division of HP Software Division of Hewlett Packard Enterprise in 2017, with many capabilities acquired from Mercury Interactive Corporation.

name: HP-UFT
gist: HPE Unified Functional Testing software, formerly known as HP QuickTest Professional, provides functional and regression test automation for software applications and environments.

name: SoapUI
gist: SoapUI is an open-source web service testing application for service-oriented architectures and representational state transfers.

name: Selenium Webdriver
gist: Selenium is a portable software-testing framework for web applications.

name: Appium
gist: Appium is an open source test automation framework for use with native, hybrid and mobile web apps.

name: JIRA
gist: Jira is a proprietary issue tracking product, developed by Atlassian. It provides bug tracking, issue tracking, and project management functions.

name: ARD
gist: With CA Agile Requirements Designer, you can create model based automated test cases which  can improve software quality, reduce testing costs and speed up application delivery.

name: IBM-RTC
gist: Rational Team Concert is a software development team collaboration tool developed by the Rational Software brand of IBM, who first released it in 2008. The software is available in both client versions, a web version, and on Cloud.

name: TestNG
gist: TestNG is a testing framework for the Java programming language created by CÃ©dric Beust and inspired by JUnit and NUnit.
